(OK, so we say they go onto ship, caused the damage and not let them 
escape? Or do we say the whole fight didn't happen and they never 
came in the ship?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> ( The mode was coming into the ship. True I never said the hatch 
wasnt open, 
> but it was a mode. They just cant barge into a ship, past shields 
and 
> internal/external autoguns like that.)
